tool_description: Calculates available generation capacity from various power plants considering maintenance schedules, fuel availability, and operational constraints.
error_messages: Invalid power plant IDs: One or more plant IDs not found in generation database.
Invalid forecast duration: Must be between 1 and 8760 hours.
Invalid start time: Forecast start time must be in the future.
Invalid reserve margin: Must be between 5 and 25 percent.
Plant data unavailable: Generation data not available for some specified plants.
usage: Provide power_plant_ids array, forecast_start_time, and forecast_duration_hours. Optionally set maintenance and fuel constraint flags and reserve margin. Returns available generation capacity forecast.

maintenance_outages.description: Number of plants scheduled for maintenance
